publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 46
ab.l: Č́okt́u B́eĺ b́uǵuĺd́u Ńevo boldular abaḥlary kijikḱa da tuvarɣa artyḥ ḱot́urḿagijiźd́ań jukĺariń ḱot́urḿakniń jadamaḥqa.
Ḱoǵuĺd́uĺar č́okt́uĺar bir- d́ań bolalmadylar qutḥarma öźĺariń jukt́ań da ǯanlary jeśerlik byla bardy.
Tynlajyz maja juv́u Jaʿaqovnun da bar qaldyɣy juv́uńuń Jisraʾeĺniń ol öśt́uŕuĺǵańĺar qursaḥtan ol ḱot́uŕuĺ- ǵańĺar qursaḥtan.
Da qartlyḥqa d́ejiń ḿeń ol da pirlikḱa d́ejiń ḿeń ḱot́uŕurmiń ḿeń jarattym da ḿeń da ḿeń ḱot́uŕurmiń da ḿeń jukḱa kiŕarmin siźniń üč́uń da qutharyrmyn siźni.
Kimǵa uqša- tasyz da t́eńaš́tiŕasiź ḿeni da t́eńaštiŕasiź ḿeni da ušarmonmo.

Ol učuzlašuvčular altynny jančyḥtan da ḱumuš́ńu ullu ullu öĺč́av́ byla ölč́ejdirĺar jalɣa aladyrlar altynčyny
da qyladyr T́eńri juǵuńadir anar hem bašuradyr anar.
Ḱot́uŕadir any javrun üśt́uńa ėĺt́adir any da qaldyradyr any ornun- da da turadyr ornunda qozɣalmejdyr hem firjat ėt́adirĺar anar da qaruv b́erḿejdir tarlyɣyndan jarlyɣašlamejdyr any.
Saɣynyjyz bunu da kipĺanijiź qajttyryjyz tanuvčular ėśḱa.
Saɣynyjyz bu- runɣu iš́ĺarni avaldan ki ḿeń T́eńri da joḥtur artyḥ T́eńri da joḥtur ḿenim kibik.
Anlašuvču bašlyɣyndan sopuna d́ejiń da avaldan ńeki qylynmadylar ajtmaɣy keńašimniń qajam bolur da bar kĺagim qylynyr.
Čaɣyramyn mizraḥtan Koreš́ni jyraḥ jerd́ań keńaš́či kišimni hem śoźĺadim hem qylarmyn jarattym hem qylarmyn.
Tyn- lajyz maja ḱuč́ĺu juŕakliĺar ol jyraḥ ket́uv́č́uĺar rastlyḥtan.
Juvuttum rastlyɣymny jyraḥ ket́ḿaśt́ da jarlyɣašym kečikḿaśt́ da b́erirmiń Cijonda jarlyɣaš Jisraʾeĺǵa ḱorḱumńu.
